data.name: Myth of Mirka
data.detailed_description:
Choose your own adventure in this visual novel about mysterious government experiments gone wrong! The story begins when your private jet crashes during a blizzard. You survive, but your wife and daughter are missing. You have no cellular signal and your body is starting to enter hypothermia. What do you do?
Find your Family or Seek Shelter?

These are the types of moral and ethical decisions you must answer if you want to get to the bottom of the Myth of Mirka. The game includes multiple endings and 2 areas of the storyline split randomly down a 50/50 path, providing replayability (even if you make the same choices).

CONTROLS: LEFT MOUSE CLICK

data.short_description: Choose your own adventure in this visual novel about government experiments gone wrong.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia GPU with 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 208 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core @ 2.6 GHz
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia GPU with 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 208 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
Created in Unity with the PlayMaker visual scripting tool.
Steam Achievements were integrated using the Heathen Group Steamworks Asset https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/integration/steamworks-complete-190316

The following free Unity Asset Store assets were used in this game:
Art by MathArtCode https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/mexican-ancient-art-style-vol-2-21427
Music by Alan Zaring https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/rpg-music-starter-pack-203313
3D Models by Vergis https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/books-scrolls-and-other-things-hdrp-urp-standard-198855
